overview:
Senior Technical Manager with 15 years experience, enjoying solving challenges in a dynamic environment.

  • Web Languages (Ruby on Rails, Java, PHP)
  • Rich Internet Application (RIA) Development with Adobe Flex 3
  • Database Design (Oracle, MySQL 5, MongoDB),
  • LDAP Schema design and implementation
  • Datawarehousing (system analysis, schema design and optimization)
  • XML-based system interoperability 12+ years experience in project management. 5+ years product management. 7+ years experience in technical team leadership and coaching. 10+ years of internet architecture and software development experience. Strong understanding and hands-on experience of XML, XSLT, HTML, JavaScript and Internet protocols. Broad technical knowledge of Internet products and technologies.

degrees.subject: General Engineering, Thesis in Artificial Intelligence
